<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Commanding Lash](/Spells.aspx?ID=1845)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Linguistic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=101" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 380 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Tyranny](/Domains.aspx?ID=96)

<row gap="medium">

 

**Requirements** Your most recent action dealt damage to a target
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 100 feet

**Target** a creature you dealt damage to on your most recent action
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Will

**Duration** until the end of the target's next turn
</row>

</column>

---

With the threat of more pain, you compel a creature you've recently harmed. You issue a command to the target, with the effects of the spell command. If the target is [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37), or taking [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), it takes a –2 circumstance penalty to the save. Regardless of the result, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.
